purpose.description: Your code successfully implements the core functions needed for the Number Guesser game. The `generateTarget`, `updateScore`, and `advanceRound` functions are correctly defined and fulfill their intended purposes.

The `compareGuesses` function has a small issue with variable names. Ensure that the parameters `player`, `computer`, and `number` are used correctly within the function. The variables `targetNumber`, `humanGuess`, and `computerGuess` are not defined within the function scope.

readability.description: Your code is well-structured and easy to follow. The use of arrow functions and consistent indentation enhances readability.
Consider adding comments to explain the purpose of each function. This will make it easier for others (and yourself) to understand the code in the future.

performance.description: The use of `Math.abs()` in the `compareGuesses` function is a good choice for calculating the absolute difference, ensuring accurate comparisons.
Consider adding input validation to ensure that the human guess is between 0 and 9. This can prevent potential errors if the user inputs an invalid number.
